name: Bonsai Utopia
description:
Bonsai Utopia is a game that can heal your heart.
Level up the bonsai, create facilities and fellow animals, and let 's create a magnificent world just for you!
A beautiful bonsai world awaits your return!

How to play the game
Tap bonsai to level up.
We will prepare the environment and create animals and double our vitality.
Using the life force to enlarge the world to become a world tree [yggdrasil] from the bonsai.

Characteristic:
1. Easy operation - Create life force of bonsai with simple operation just tapping.
2. Clear graphics of low polygons - You can see the beautiful world of low polygon 3D from any angle.
3. Lovely Back Music - Calm your feelings, such as the birds singing in the silence and the sound of water, providing a wonderful music experience.
4. Scenery changes according to the season - Cherry blossoms will bloom, autumn leaves will bloom according to the time you spend.
The time you spend changes the view of BONSAI.
